author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-6255. Create RPM and Debian packages for common. Changes deployment
layout to be consistent across the binary tgz, rpm, and deb. Adds setup
scripts for easy one node cluster configuration and user creation.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 3859 by extending the revert list table to allow
both an ACTUAL_NODE and a NODES row to be recorded.
(STMT_CREATE_REVERT_LIST): Add actual column to revert_list table and
make it part of the primary key, set the actual column when adding
(STMT_SELECT_REVERT_LIST): Select, and order by, actual column.
(revert_list_read): Handle getting up to two rows per path.

author: ivaynberg
msg: quickie test fix, need to think some more about this :/
